string-array.name: radioLocalMessages
string-array.item: Hello! Open your radio now and enjoy the day with great music!
Don\'t miss out on your favorite artist\'s songs! Remember to tune into the radio.
If you need some music in your life, turn on the radio and listen!
Elevate your mood by turning on the radio and enjoying some upbeat tunes!
When you\'re feeling bored, all you need to do is turn on the radio. Start listening now!
For music at any time of day, tune into the radio and listen.
Don\'t miss your favorite radio program! Turn on the radio and start listening.
Turn on the radio and lose yourself in the music. Unforgettable songs are waiting for you.
Turn on the radio and enjoy the sound of great music!
Add some energy to your day with beautiful music. Don\'t forget to turn on the radio!
